archimate:Resource.name: Data Transformer
archimate:Resource.documentation: This ABB is responsible for transforming data formats from source to target format; e.g., from proprietary to industry standards and vice versa. It integrates with the Information Layer to obtain metadata such as the canonical form, etc.

properties.value: This ABB is responsible for transforming data formats from source to target format; e.g., from proprietary to industry standards and vice versa. It integrates with the Information Layer to obtain metadata such as the canonical form, etc.
